levels.description: Deals <@ba.vup>{attack@atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Physical damage per attack and <$ba.sluggish>Slows</> targets for <@ba.vup>{attack@sluggish}</> second. Projectiles will briefly pass through enemies after striking them, then return; all enemies hit during the return take <@ba.vup>{attack@atk_scale_comeback:0%}</> ATK as Physical damage
